cho_description:
COL: [K.2838](http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/collection_online/collection_object_details.aspx?partId=1&objectId=310658)

Fragment of a clay tablet, 14 lines of inscription. Neo-Assyrian.
Length: 8.89 centimetres Width: 5.08 centimetres

Made from 200 images taken with a Nikon D5100 by Terhi Nurmikko-Fuller, assembled by Daniel Pett in Photoscan.
